title: audio-capture
description: Captures audio from browser tabs for analysis, detection, or processing workflows. Provides tab audio capture infrastructure that can be extended with analysis, file upload, and results display functionality.
example_use_cases: Detect AI generated deepfake audio content from tab audio capture
Record tab audio for analysis, verification, or processing workflows

title: ai-browser-agent
description: AI-powered browser automation assistant with multi-agent system. Inspired by Nanobrowser, it provides intelligent web navigation, task execution, and information extraction capabilities using LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic). Features a chat interface for natural language commands and autonomous browsing.
example_use_cases: Create an AI assistant that can navigate websites and extract information based on natural language queries
Build a browser automation agent that can perform multi-step web tasks like form filling, data scraping, and content analysis
Develop an intelligent research assistant that can browse multiple pages and summarize findings
Make an AI shopping assistant that can search products, compare prices, and extract specifications
Create a social media automation agent that can navigate platforms and gather insights
